_header: O thou joyful light eternal ye shine
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: John Lydgate, ‘Regina celi letare’ — five rhyme royal stanzas, each with an additional line in Latin

CamTCC601.First Lines:
o thow ioyfull lyght eternall ye shyneIn glory with laureat
                    coronallDescendyd from Dauid Worthiest on lyueModyr to youre
                    souereynes and lord imperyall…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Banysshyd ys owre sorow and aduersiteDicamus omnes
                        Alleluya

BLHar2251.First Lines:
O thou Ioieful light eterne ye shyneIn glory with laureat
                    coronall…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Of thi blissed modir mayden mariaBanysshed is oure sorw and
                    aduersiteDicamus omnes alleluyA
